Solar Power

Source: vignettes/solarpower.Rmd
solarpower.Rmd
library(merra2ools)
#> Loading required package: data.table
library(tidyverse)
#> -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 --
#> v ggplot2 3.3.3     v purrr   0.3.4
#> v tibble  3.0.5     v dplyr   1.0.3

#> v readr   1.4.0     v forcats 0.5.1
#> -- Conflicts ------------------------------------------ tidyverse_conflicts() --
#> x dplyr::between()   masks data.table::between()
#> x dplyr::filter()    masks stats::filter()

#> x dplyr::lag()       masks stats::lag()
#> x dplyr::last()      masks data.table::last()
#> x purrr::transpose() masks data.table::transpose()
library("cowplot")

# Example dataset
merra <- merra2_sample(1, add.coord = T)
merra

Plane of Array (POA) irradiance model

All steps at once

poa <- fPOA(merra)
#> nrow(x) =  4990464 
#> Calculating:
#>    The day of the year (yday) and the hour (hour) at UTC timezone
#>    Solar declination (declination)
#>    Equation of time (eq_time)
#>    Apparent solar time (solar_time) 1 2 3 
#>    Hour angle (hour_angle) 1 2 3 
#>    Zenith angle (zenith) 1 2 3 
#>    Direct beam hour (beam)
#>    Integrating...ok
#>    Azimuth angle (azimuth) 
#>    DNI and DHI
#>    PV-array position, array.type: fh fl th tv td 
#>    Angle of incidence (AOI), array.type: fh fl th tv td 
#>    Plane of Array Irradiance (POA), array.type: fh fl th tv td

Step-by-step

Solar postion

x <- solar_position(merra, keep.all = T)
#>    The day of the year (yday) and the hour (hour) at UTC timezone
#>    Solar declination (declination)
#>    Equation of time (eq_time)
#>    Apparent solar time (solar_time) 1 2 
#>    Hour angle (hour_angle) 1 2 
#>    Zenith angle (zenith) 1 2 
#>    Direct beam hour (beam)
#>    Integrating...ok
#>    Azimuth angle (azimuth)

Global Horizontal Irradiance decomposition

x <- solar_irradiance(x, keep.all = T)
#>    DNI and DHI

PV-array position

x <- pv_array_position(x, array.type = "all")
#>    PV-array position, array.type: fh fl th tv td

Angle of Incidence (AOI)

x <- angle_of_incidence(x, array.type = "all")
#>    Angle of incidence (AOI), array.type: fh fl th tv td

Plane of Array (POA) irradiance

x <- poa_irradiance(x, array.type = "all", keep.all = T)
#>    Plane of Array Irradiance (POA), array.type: fh fl th tv td
